agent_utterance: You’re doing great. Tonight is hot and Monday is demanding, so let’s keep it ultra-simple: 1) sip a full glass of water (about 250 ml). 2) try 1 minute of box breathing (inhale 4, hold 4, exhale 4, hold 4). 3) pause and check your hunger and mood. If you still feel you could snack and it feels doable, have a tiny snack (for example, a small apple slice or a couple of almonds) and log it. If not, skip the snack and log your hunger/mood. 4) after logging, complete a quick 1-minute stretch or a short indoor walk to reset. You’ve got this.
agent_monologue: I considered the hot, Monday evening and the user’s emotional sensitivity. This aligns with their plan and supports adherence.
